title: Veigar Guide plz
body: Hey everyone I recently got into veigar and I enjoy his playstyle. I can farm easily with his q and I can hit the combo. plz provide build ability path

replies.body:
Make sure you use your e where you think the champion is gonna go and max out you Q first then you W then your E Because if you use your E and they get stunned you can use you Q and E at the same time to get the maximum amount of damage.
{{champion:45}}
